api.title: ResourceCursorTreeAdapter
api.api-signature: public abstract class ResourceCursorTreeAdapter extends CursorTreeAdapter

class.name: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter
class.description: An easy adapter to map columns from a cursor to TextViews or ImageViews defined in an XML file.

method.name: bindChildView(View view, Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isLastChild)
method.description: Bind an existing view to the child data pointed to by cursor

method.name: bindGroupView(View view, Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isExpanded)
method.description: Bind an existing view to the group data pointed to by cursor.

method.name: getChildView(int groupPosition, int childPosition, boolean isLastChild, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
getChildrenCursor(Cursor groupCursor)
method.description: Gets the Cursor for the children at the given group.

method.name: getGroupView(int groupPosition, boolean isExpanded, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
newChildView(Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isLastChild, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Makes a new child view to hold the data pointed to by cursor.

method.name: newGroupView(Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isExpanded, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Makes a new group view to hold the group data pointed to by cursor.

method.name: notifyDataSetChanged(boolean releaseCursors)
method.description: Notifies a data set change, but with the option of not releasing any cached cursors.

method.name: onGroupCollapsed(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is collapsed.

method.name: setChildrenCursor(int groupPosition, Cursor childrenCursor)
method.description: Sets the children Cursor for a particular group.

method.name: setGroupCursor(Cursor cursor)
method.description: Sets the group Cursor.

method.name: getChildType(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Get the type of child View that will be created by ExpandableListAdapter.getChildView(int, int, boolean, View, ViewGroup) for the specified child item.

method.name: getCombinedChildId(long groupId, long childId)
method.description: Override this method if you foresee a clash in IDs based on this scheme:

method.name: getCombinedGroupId(long groupId)
method.description: Override this method if you foresee a clash in IDs based on this scheme:

method.name: getGroupType(int groupPosition)
method.description: Get the type of group View that will be created by ExpandableListAdapter.getGroupView(int, boolean, View, ViewGroup) .

method.name: onGroupCollapsed(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is collapsed.

method.name: onGroupExpanded(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is expanded.

method.name: clone()
method.description: Creates and returns a copy of this object.

method.name: equals(Object obj)
method.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one.

method.name: finalize()
method.description: Called by the garbage collector on an object when garbage collection determines that there are no more references to the object.

method.name: getClass()
method.description: Returns the runtime class of this Object.

method.name: hashCode()
method.description: Returns a hash code value for the object.

method.name: notify()
method.description: Wakes up a single thread that is waiting on this object's monitor.

method.name: notifyAll()
method.description: Wakes up all threads that are waiting on this object's monitor.

method.name: toString()
method.description: Returns a string representation of the object.

method.name: wait(long millis, int nanos)
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object, or some other thread interrupts the current thread, or a certain amount of real time has elapsed.

method.name: wait(long millis)
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until either another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object, or a specified amount of time has elapsed.

method.name: wait()
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object.

method.name: getChild(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Gets the data associated with the given child within the given group.

method.name: getChildId(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Gets the ID for the given child within the given group.

method.name: getChildView(int groupPosition, int childPosition, boolean isLastChild, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Gets a View that displays the data for the given child within the given group.

method.name: getChildrenCount(int groupPosition)
method.description: Gets the number of children in a specified group.

method.name: getCombinedChildId(long groupId, long childId)
method.description: Gets an ID for a child that is unique across any item (either group or child) that is in this list.

method.name: getCombinedGroupId(long groupId)
method.description: Gets an ID for a group that is unique across any item (either group or child) that is in this list.

method.name: getGroup(int groupPosition)
method.description: Gets the data associated with the given group.

method.name: getGroupCount()
method.description: Gets the number of groups.

method.name: getGroupId(int groupPosition)
method.description: Gets the ID for the group at the given position.

method.name: getGroupView(int groupPosition, boolean isExpanded, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Gets a View that displays the given group.

method.name: hasStableIds()
method.description: Indicates whether the child and group IDs are stable across changes to the underlying data.

method.name: isChildSelectable(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Whether the child at the specified position is selectable.

method.name: onGroupCollapsed(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is collapsed.

method.name: onGroupExpanded(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is expanded.

method.name: getChildType(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Get the type of child View that will be created by ExpandableListAdapter.getChildView(int, int, boolean, View, ViewGroup) for the specified child item.

method.name: getGroupType(int groupPosition)
method.description: Get the type of group View that will be created by ExpandableListAdapter.getGroupView(int, boolean, View, ViewGroup) .

method.name: ResourceCursorTreeAdapter(Context context, Cursor cursor, int collapsedGroupLayout, int expandedGroupLayout, int childLayout, int lastChildLayout)
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: ResourceCursorTreeAdapter(Context context, Cursor cursor, int collapsedGroupLayout, int expandedGroupLayout, int childLayout)
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: ResourceCursorTreeAdapter(Context context, Cursor cursor, int groupLayout, int childLayout)
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: newChildView(Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isLastChild, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Makes a new child view to hold the data pointed to by cursor.

method.name: newGroupView(Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isExpanded, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Makes a new group view to hold the group data pointed to by cursor.

api.name: ResourceCursorTreeAdapter
api.api_signature: public ResourceCursorTreeAdapter (Context context, Cursor cursor, int collapsedGroupLayout, int expandedGroupLayout, int childLayout, int lastChildLayout)

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: The context where the ListView associated with this SimpleListItemFactory is running

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The database cursor

parameter.name: collapsedGroupLayout
parameter.description: int: resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for collapsed groups.

parameter.name: expandedGroupLayout
parameter.description: int: resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for expanded groups.

parameter.name: childLayout
parameter.description: int: resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for all children but the last..

parameter.name: lastChildLayout
parameter.description: int: resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for the last child of a group.

api.name: ResourceCursorTreeAdapter
api.api_signature: public ResourceCursorTreeAdapter (Context context, Cursor cursor, int collapsedGroupLayout, int expandedGroupLayout, int childLayout)

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: The context where the ListView associated with this SimpleListItemFactory is running

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The database cursor

parameter.name: collapsedGroupLayout
parameter.description: int: resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for collapsed groups.

parameter.name: expandedGroupLayout
parameter.description: int: resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for expanded groups.

parameter.name: childLayout
parameter.description: int: resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for all children.

api.name: ResourceCursorTreeAdapter
api.api_signature: public ResourceCursorTreeAdapter (Context context, Cursor cursor, int groupLayout, int childLayout)

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: The context where the ListView associated with this SimpleListItemFactory is running

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The database cursor

parameter.name: groupLayout
parameter.description: int: resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for all groups.

parameter.name: childLayout
parameter.description: int: resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for all children.

api.name: newChildView
api.api_signature: public View newChildView (Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isLastChild, ViewGroup parent)
api.description: Makes a new child view to hold the data pointed to by cursor.

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: Interface to application's global information

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The cursor from which to get the data. The cursor is already moved to the correct position.

parameter.name: isLastChild
parameter.description: boolean: Whether the child is the last child within its group.

parameter.name: parent
parameter.description: ViewGroup: The parent to which the new view is attached to

parameter.name: View
parameter.description: the newly created view.

api.name: newGroupView
api.api_signature: public View newGroupView (Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isExpanded, ViewGroup parent)
api.description: Makes a new group view to hold the group data pointed to by cursor.

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: Interface to application's global information

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The group cursor from which to get the data. The cursor is already moved to the correct position.

parameter.name: isExpanded
parameter.description: boolean: Whether the group is expanded.

parameter.name: parent
parameter.description: ViewGroup: The parent to which the new view is attached to

parameter.name: View
parameter.description: The newly created view.
